title: Abanderada font
content:
i'm working a new family of serif fonts, look the pdf, and coment your suggestions for refine this version ;-)   
   
PD: los comentarios en castellano ser
author: pepel

comments.content: nice work. almost up there with "sauna" from Underware. Hrant no comment yet. You will most likely love this.

It looks charming, and worth pursuing, I think - just not my cup of tea.   
But Josep probably knows that you can't please everybody!   
   
hhp
Buen trabajo. Funciona bien tanto para t

It looks really nice .. some things that popped into my mind while quickly viewing, were:   
\> "4" should be on the same level with fellow "3" and "5" -- at the moment this kinkyness seems unconvincing   
\> this "~" thingie on "o" (estonian "

Maybe It's just me, but the lc f looks too fat.   
M looks a bit heavy in the top right.   
Spine of S looks a little thick too.   
Top bar of E looks a bit thin.   
   
At a glance with a few minutes and cents to spare, that is how I see it. Nice work, though!

Thanks for all coments ;-)   
   
the font was been finishend (include a heavy-italic version) and is diponible in the t26 foundry in a new name "Gopal"   
   
 [http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=823](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417100713/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=823)

Thanks for all coments ;-)
